c:complexType.name: Panel
c:complexType.c:documentation: The common options documentation class of the CCC panels.

c:property.name: size
c:property.c:documentation:
The fixed size of the panel, in pixel units or as a percentage.
See for information about the different supported data types.

c:property.name: sizeMax
c:property.c:documentation:
The maximum size of the panel, in pixel units or as a percentage.
See for information about the different supported data types.
